channel.title: Justin Hellings Life Coaching
channel.description: Articles about life coaching and related subjects

item.title: Feeling ashamed and how to deal with it
item.description: Do you long for some kind of reset button that would make everyone else forget the things you feel ashamed about? This is the kind of fantasy that is very appealing when you suffer from shame a lot. If that describes you then you are not suffering alone.

item.title: Labels: A gift or a burden?
item.description: We often use labels for ourselves and other people. Some labels have a permanence that more nuanced kinds of description do not have.
